install.name: RSGallery2 Display
install.author: Jonah
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2005 - 2008 Open Source Matters. All rights reserved.
install.description: This displays a gallery using a template from RSGallery2.

param.name: rsgTemplate
param.label: Template Name
param.description: The technical name of the template. No spaces or caps.

param.name: gid
param.label: Gallery ID
param.description: The gallery ID can be found in the Gallery Manager ID column.
